metadata.title: Labaran Duniya
metadata.summary: Ziyarci shafin BBC Hausa domin samun rahotannin bidiyo da hotuna kan labarun Najeriya da Nijar da ma sauran sassan duniya baki daya.

headlines.headline: Buratai ya yi magana kan kashe-kashen Zamfara

items.summary: Babban hafsin sojojin Najeriya, Tukur Yusuf Buratai ya yi magana game da kashe-kashen da ke faruwa a jihar Zamfara.

relatedItems.summary: An haifi jaririyar a asibitin General Hospital wanda ke karamar hukumar Gwadabawa a jihar Sokoto.

headlines.headline: An kashe mutum 3,500 a Zamfara a shekara biyar

relatedItems.summary: An kashe mutum 3,500 a tsawon shekara biyar, kamar yadda sakataren gwamnatin jihar ya shaida wa BBC.

headlines.headline: Tsugunne ba ta kare ba a Sudan

items.summary: Labarai da sharhi game da yadda ake rikicin siyasar Sudan, yayin da aka shiga kwana shida a jere na zanga-zangar adawa da Shugaba Omar al-Bashir.

headlines.headline: Ko United za ta iya cin Barca a Camp Nou?

items.summary: Karawar daf da na kusa da na karshe tsakanin Man United da Barcelona, Ajax da Juventus.

headlines.headline: Matsalar Zamfara ta fi karfin jami'an tsaro kadai — Marafa

items.summary: Sanata Kabiru Marafa ya ce saboda yadda matsalar tsaron jihar ta Zamfara ta yi muni jami'an tsaro kadai ba za su iya magance ta ba.

indexImage.caption: Ba wanda zai iya gaya ma irin munin matsalar kamar yadda idan ka je za ka gani da idonka

imageThumbnail.caption: Ba wanda zai iya gaya ma irin munin matsalar kamar yadda idan ka je za ka gani da idonka

headlines.headline: Likita ya gano tarin kwari a idon wata mata

items.summary: Wasu likitoci a Taiwan sun gano wasu kananan kwari masu kama da kudan zuma a idon wata mata.

headlines.headline: Ana ci gaba da zanga-zanga a Sudan

items.summary: Jama'a sun ci gaba da gudanar da zanga-zangar neman Shugaban Sudan Omar al-Bashir ya sauka daga mulki a daidai lokacin da ake jiran jawabin daga rundunar sojin kasar a ranar Alhamis.

headlines.headline: Sojoji na gab da yin wata muhimmiyar sanarwa a Sudan

items.summary: Sojojin Sudan za su yi wata muhimmmiyar sanarwa kowane lokaci daga yanzu bayan da dubban masu zanga-zanga suka shafe dare na 5 suna kira ga Shugaba al-Bashir ya sauka daga mulki.

headlines.headline: An haifi jaririya mai kai biyu a Sokoto

items.summary: An haifi jaririyar a asibitin General Hospital wanda ke karamar hukumar Gwadabawa a jihar Sokoto.

headlines.headline: Kun san tasirin mata a zanga-zangar Sudan?

items.summary: Kiyasi ya nuna cewa mata su ne kashi biyu bisa uku na yawan wadanda suka ringa halartar zanga-zangar kin jinin gwamnatin Shugaba Omar Al-Bashir.

media.title: Kun san tasirin mata a zanga-zangar Sudan?

headlines.headline: An kashe mutum 3,500 a Zamfara a shekara biyar

items.summary: An kashe mutum 3,500 a tsawon shekara biyar, kamar yadda sakataren gwamnatin jihar ya shaida wa BBC.

indexImage.caption: Jami'an tsaron 'yan sanda da na soja da na farin kaya wato DSS da kuma na asiri duka za su yi aiki tare a Zamfara.

headlines.headline: Kwace Filaye: An yi zanga-zangar a Abuja

items.summary: Jama'ar garin Tungar Maje na yankin babban birnin tarayya Abuja sun gudanar da wata zanga-zanga karo na biyu a cikin makonni uku, inda suka dakatar da zirga-zirgar ababen hawa a kan hanyar Abuja zuwa Lakwaja.

headlines.headline: Yadda za ka zama kamar ni – Dangote

items.summary: Mutumin da ya fi kowa arziki a nahiyar Afirka Alhaji Aliko Dangote ya bai wa matasan nahiyar shawarwari idan suna son zama kamarsa.

headlines.headline: An yi dauki-ba-dadi tsakanin 'yan sa-kai da masu satar mutane

items.summary: Mutane sun yi gangami sun shiga dazuka don farautar masu satar mutane a Najeriya.

indexImage.altText: Satar mutane da garkuwa da su don neman kudin fansa ta zamo ruwan dare a Najeriya

headlines.headline: An ja daga kan mukamin Kakakin Majalisar Najeriya

items.summary: Duk da cewa jam'iyyar APC mai mulki ta ce za ta kebe mukamin Kakakin ga shiyya daya daga cikin shida wasu 'yan majalisar daga wasu shiyyoyin tuni sun fito takara

indexImage.caption: Zuwa yanzu 'yan majalisar wakilai fiye da goma ne suka fito takarar mukamin Kakakin

imageThumbnail.caption: Zuwa yanzu 'yan majalisar wakilai fiye da goma ne suka fito takarar mukamin Kakakin

headlines.headline: Sojoji sun hallaka 'yan Boko Haram

items.summary: Rundunar sojin Najeriya ta ce dakarunta sun dakile tare da hallaka wasu mayakan Boko Haram a Damaturu.

items.summary: Sakamakon baya-bayan nan na Zaben Gwamnoni na Najeriya, kamar yadda Hukumar Zabe ta Kasa INEC ta sanar, kamar yadda ku ke gani a taswira da teburi.

items.summary: Wannan shafi yana kawo muku sakamakon zaben gwamnan jihar Kano da ke kudu maso yammacin Najeriya kai-tsaye.

headlines.headline: Boyayyun abubuwa game da CP Wakili

items.summary: Tauraruwar kwamishinan 'yan sandan Kano CP Muhammad Wakili Singam na kara haskawa tun bayan da ya fara aiki a Kano. To sai dai mutane kadan ne suke da masaniya kan rayuwarsa.

media.title: Abubuwan da ba ku sani ba dangane da CP Wakili

synopses.short: Abubuwan da ba ku sani ba dangane da CP Wakili Singham
synopses.long:
Tauraruwar kwamishinan 'yan sandan Kano CP Muhammad Wakili Singam na kara haskawa tun bayan da ya fara aiki a Kano. To sai dai mutane kadan ne suke da masaniya kan rayuwarsa. 

A wata hira ta musamman BBC ta tambayi kwamishinan da ake kira Singham, ya bayyana wasu sirrikan rayuwarsa da mafi yawan jama'a ba su sani ba.
synopses.medium: Tauraruwar kwamishinan 'yan sandan Kano CP Muhammad Wakili Singam na kara haskawa tun bayan da ya fara aiki a Kano. To sai dai mutane kadan ne suke da masaniya kan rayuwarsa.

media.caption: CP Singham, dan Sanda abokin kowa

headlines.headline: Me ya sa kifin Afirka Ta Yamma ke bacewa?

items.summary: Bidiyo kan binciken da BBC ta yi na dalilin da ke jawo bacewar kifaye a tekunan Yammacin Afirka.

media.title: Me ya sa kifin Afirka Ta Yamma ke bacewa?

synopses.short: Me ya sa kifin Afirka Ta Yamma ke bacewa a tekuna?
synopses.long: BBC ta yi bincike kan yadda ake kama kifi ba bisa ka'ida ba a gabar tekun Afirka Ta Yamma, don gano daya daga cikin dalilan da a yanzu haka kifin ke bacewa a tekunan yankin.
synopses.medium: Bidiyo kan binciken da BBC ta yi na dalilin da ke jawo bacewar kifaye a tekunan Yammacin Afirka.

media.caption: Bidiyon abun da ya sa kifin Afirka Ta Yamma ke bacewa.

headlines.headline: Abubuwan da ba su da dadi a mulki – Gwamnan Bauchi

items.summary: Duk da dadi da alfarmar da ke cikin mulki a Najeriya, musamman ga gwamnoni, wasunsu na cewa akwai wasu matsaloli da ke tattare da mulkin.

media.title: Abubuwan da basu da dadi a mulki - Gwamnan Bauchi

synopses.short: Abubuwa biyar da basu da dadi a mulki - Gwamnan Bauchi
synopses.long:
Duk da dadi da alfarmar da ke cikin mulki a Najeriya, musamman ga gwamnoni, wasunsu na cewa akwai wasu matsaloli da ke tattare da mulkin.
Ba kasafai aka fiya jin matsalolin da masu mulki ke fuskanta ba, ku kalli wannan bidiyon don jin abubuwan da Gwamnan Bauchi Mohammed A Abubakar ya ce ba ya jin dadinsu:
synopses.medium: Duk da dadi da alfarmar da ke cikin mulki a Najeriya, musamman ga gwamnoni, wasunsu na cewa akwai wasu matsaloli da ke tattare da mulkin.

media.caption: Matsaloli zama gwamna

headlines.headline: Ra'ayoyin jama'ar Kano kan zaben Ganduje

items.summary: Wasu daga cikin 'yan jihar sun amince da sahihancin zaben, wasu kuma basu amince da sahihancin zaben ba.

headlines.headline: Ko Napoli za ta ci Arsenal a Emirates?

items.summary: Karo na biyu kenan da Napoli za ta ziyarci Arsenal a gasar Zakarun Turai a Emirates, bayan da aka doke ta 2-0 a 2013-14.

headlines.headline: Chelsea ta je Slavia Prague a karon farko

items.summary: Chelsea ta ziyarci Slavia Prague a karon farko domin buga karawar daf da na kusa da na karshe a gasar Zakarun Turai ta Europa League

headlines.headline: 'Filin Tottenhma ba zai ba mu tsoro ba'

items.summary: Pep Guardiola ya ce sabon filin Tottenham ba zai bai wa Manchester City su tsoro ba, idan sun zo buga gasar Zakarun Turai.

headlines.headline: An dakatar da Diego Costa buga wasa 8

items.summary: An dakatar da Diego Costa buga wasa takwas, an kuma ci shi tara kan samun sa da laifin cin zarafin alkalin wasa.

headlines.headline: Liverpool ta taka rawa a Champions League

items.summary: Karawar da za ake yi tsakanin Liverpool da FC Porto da kuma wasa tsakanin Tottenham da Manchester City.

headlines.headline: 'Yan Najeriya sun harzuka kan kashe-kashen Zamfara

items.summary: Daruruwan 'yan Najeriya ne suka fita kan tituna a wasu jihohi na kasar da ma Abuja, inda suke yin maci don nuna fushinsu da damuwarsu kan kashe mutane da ake yi a jihar Zamfara.

indexImage.caption: Zanga-zangar ta fi kamari a Abuja babban birnin kasar

headlines.headline: Kun san matan da suka fi kudi a duniya?

items.summary: Shin kun san jerin matayen da suka fi kudi a duniya?

indexImage.caption: Yawan mata masu arziki na kara karuwa a 'yan kwanakin nan

headlines.headline: Wadanne kalubale ne ke gaban El-Rufai?

items.summary: Nasir Ahmad El-Rufai ya lashe zaben jihar Kaduna a karo na biyu, bayan fafatawa da abokin hamayyarsa Isa Ashiru na jam'iyyar PDP. To ko wadanne kalubale ne a gabansa?

byline.name: Fauziyya  Kabir Tukur & Mustapha Musa Kaita
byline.title: BBC Hausa, Abuja

headlines.headline: Shari'ar Musulunci ta fusata 'yan fim

items.summary: Matakin amfani da Shari'ar Musulunci wajen hukunta 'yan luwadi da masu zina ya sa fitaccen dan fim na Amurka, George Clooney, kira da a kaurace wa otal-otal mallakar Brunei.

indexImage.altText: Dan fim na Amurka George Clooney
indexImage.caption: George Clooney ya ce Shari'ar Musulunci keta haddi ne ga dan adam

imageThumbnail.altText: Dan fim na Amurka George Clooney
imageThumbnail.caption: George Clooney ya ce Shari'ar Musulunci keta haddi ne ga dan adam

headlines.headline: Abin da ya sa na yi wakar 'Ta leko ta labe' – Rarara

items.summary: A hirar da BBC ta yi da mawakin, ya yi bayani kan wasu kalamai da yayi amfani da su a wakokinsa da ya yiwa Ganduje.

headlines.headline: 'Akwai 'yan uwanmu a kowane bangare na siyasa'

items.summary: Shahararren dan wasan Hausa, Ali Nuhu ya bayyana wa BBC dalilin da ya sa ya shiga harkokin siyasa gadan-gadan.

headlines.headline: 'Singham' dan sanda abokin kowa

items.summary: Ganin irin hazakar Wakili, har jama'ar gari suka yi mashi lakabi da 'Singham,' wanda suna ne na wani jajairtaccen dan sanda a fim din Indiya.

indexImage.caption: Wakili zai yi ritaya ne a watan Mayun 2019.

headlines.headline: Yadda salon Abba gida-gida ya 'rikita' siyasar Kano

items.summary: Masu iya magana na cewa siyasar Kano sai Kano, kuma a ko da yaushe ta kan zo da wani abu sabo, kamar yadda a bana salon Abba gida-gida da makamantansa suka hadu a yunkurin 'yan hamayya na kifar da jam'iyyar APC mai mulki.

indexImage.caption: Ba a iya bayyana wanda ya lashe zaben na Kano ba har sai da aka shiga zagaye na biyu

headlines.headline: Sakamakon zaben Kano ya fusata wasu 'yan APC

items.summary: 'Yan wata kungiya a jam'iyyar APC sun rubuta wa uwar jam'iyyar ta kasa bukatar a yi bincike domin hukunta duk mai hannu a magudin da suka ce ya ba wa Gwamna Ganduje nasara.

indexImage.caption: Gwamna Abdullahi Umar ganduje ya ce Allah ne ya ba shi nasarar ci-gaba da rike kujerar

imageThumbnail.caption: Shugaba Buhari na shan caccaka a dangane da abubuwan da suka faru a zaben cike gibi na jihar Kano

headlines.headline: A binciki harin da aka kai wa ma'aikatan BBC a Kano – Amnesty

items.summary: Kungiyar Amnesty International ta ce a binciki harin da aka kai wa ma'aikatan BBC Hausa da kuma ma'aikatan wani gidan talabijin a Najeriya wato TVC a lokacin zaben cike gibi da aka gudanar a Kano.

headlines.headline: Ra'ayi Riga: Tsaro ya tabarbare a Zamfara

items.summary: A jihar Zamfara ta Nigeria, sha'anin tsaron ya kara tabarbarewa duk kuwa da matakan da hukumomi ke cewa su na dauka

items.summary: Zababbun hotunan abubuwan da suka faru a Afirka makon nan

indexImage.caption: Wasu matan kabilar Tuareg kenan da suka halarci bikin gargajiya a cikin hamadar Libya da ke yankin gabashin Awal , wanda yake kusa da iyakar Tunisiya da Aljeriya

headlines.headline: Hotunan zanga-zanga kan Zamfara a Najeriya

items.summary: Al'umma na gudanar da zanga-zanga a Abuja don nuna takaincinsu da yawan kashe-kashen da ake fama da shi a Zamfara.

items.name: Labaran Talabijin
items.summary: Ku kalli labaran talabijin a duk lokacin da ku ke bukata wanda mu ke gabatarwa daga ranar Litinin zuwa Juma'a da karfe takwas na dare a agogon GMT.

headlines.headline: Facebook zai yi garanbawul kan yada bidiyo kai tsaye

items.summary: Jama'a da dama sun yi wannan kira ga kamfanin Facebook tun bayan da aka kai hari a wasu masallatai biyu a New Zealand inda maharin ya yi amfani da shafin Facebook ya yi bidiyo kai tsaye ya nunawa duniya yadda ya kai harin.

headlines.headline: Boeing ya ce ya gyara manhajar jirgin 737 Max

items.summary: Kamfanin jirgin sama na Amurka ya ce zai yi sauye0sauye ga dakin matukin jirgi samfurin Max 8 wanda yayi hadari sau biyu a baya bayan nan.

indexImage.altText: Artists impression of a Boeing 737 Max 8 plane
indexImage.caption: The 737 Max 8 aircraft has only been in commercial use since 2017.

headlines.headline: Facebook ya yi karin haske kan kisan Musulmi 49

items.summary: Kamfanin Facebook ya bayyana cewa ya goge fiye da irin wannan bidiyon miliyan daya da dubu dari biyar a ranar da lamarin ya faru.

headlines.headline: Matan da ke amfani da Facebook don yaki da mayaudaran maza

items.summary: Matan sun bude wata kungiya ta mata zalla a kan shafin na Facebook inda suke tona wa mazan asiri da matan da ke alaka da su.

headlines.headline: Zaben 2019: 'Yan Najeriya na fada a Twitter

items.summary: Fada ya barke tsakanin 'yan Najeriya a shafin Twitter game da sakamakon zaben shugaban kasa da ake bayyana wa yanzu haka a Abuja.

indexImage.caption: 'Yan Najeriya da dama ne suka yi amfani da wannan hoton a Twitter
